contextId.information: This compares a believer's new spiritual life to Jesus coming back to life physically. The believer's new spiritual life enables that person to obey God. You can translate this in an active form. AT: "just as the Father brought Jesus back to life after he died, we might have new spiritual life and obey God" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: just as Christ was raised from the dead ones by the glory of the Father, so also we might walk in newness of life

contextId.information: Here Paul compares the number of the people of Israel to the number of grains of sand in the sea. AT: "too many to count" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: as the sand of the sea
